definitions.definition: A small bag for carrying money .
A handbag (small bag usually used by women for carrying various small personal items)
A quantity of money given for a particular purpose.
A specific sum of money in certain countries: formerly 500 piastres in Turkey or 50 tomans in Persia .

main_definition: A small bag for carrying money .
secondary_definitions: ( US ) A handbag (small bag usually used by women for carrying various small personal items)
A quantity of money given for a particular purpose.
( historical ) A specific sum of money in certain countries: formerly 500 piastres in Turkey or 50 tomans in Persia .
